mapper.insert: -- 过滤主键冲突 insert ignore into success_killed(seck_id,user_phone) values(#{seckId},#{userNumber})
mapper.select: -- 根据id查询SuccessKilled并携带Seckill实体 select sk.`seck_id`, sk.`user_phone`, sk.`create_time`, sk.`state`, s.`seck_id` "seckill.seck_id", s.`name` "seckill.name", s.`number` "seckill.number", s.`start_time` "seckill.start_time", s.`end_time` "seckill.end_time", s.`create_time` "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s where sk.seck_id = #{seckId}
